nodes.text: Route 6903 was a transit route in Cityblock Kesk-319 on the planet Brentaal IV in 0 ABY. The Pathline Tapcafe, a tapcafe, was located at the intersection of Route 6903 and Citypath 515, another road. Like all streets in Kesk Cityblock, Route 6903 was wide and active, but was rarely used by pedestrians and private vehicles.

Route 6903 was first mentioned in Raid on Brentaal, an adventure scenario in 1998's The Far Orbit Project, by Timothy S. O'Brien. The book was a supplement to West End Games's Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game and had the same theme of the previous publication Pirates & Privateers, as it followed the privateering frigate Far Orbit in its adventures.
